alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Webster (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 24 at 2:25PM CDT until June 24 at 3:00PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 300 PM CDT FOR SOUTHERN WEBSTER AND SOUTHEASTERN CALHOUN COUNTIES... At 224 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Gowrie, or 16 miles southwest of Fort Dodge, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Callender, Harcourt, Otho, Coalville, Lehigh, Woodman Hollow State Park and Dolliver Memorial State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for central and west central Iowa. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
